alerts.message: Banking sector poised to benefit from RBI rate cuts - consider accumulating quality names
FII selling pressure continues despite reduced intensity - monitor global sentiment
Tax saving deadline approaching - client outreach for 80C optimization required

keyHighlights: Markets showing resilience with Sensex at 82,690 (+0.38%) and Nifty at 25,330 (+0.36%)
RBI in easing cycle with repo rate at 5.50%, supporting growth while inflation controlled at 3.2%
Strong DII support with ₹6.06L crore buying vs FII selling of ₹1.27L crore in FY25
IT sector leading with 15.3% profit growth, projected to cross $300B by 2025
Tax saving season critical with 6 months left in FY25, ELSS remains attractive with 3-year lock-in
